trans-unit.source: The type of the content of the data source.
Represents the result of a sorting operation.
The <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601> interface is intended for implementation by query providers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601>接口仅供查询提供程序实现。

trans-unit.source: This interface represents the result of a sorting query that calls the method(s) <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderBy%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%2A>, <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%2A> or <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenByDescending%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此接口表示一个排序的查询，调用方法的结果<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderBy%2A>， <xref:System.Linq.Queryable.OrderByDescending%2A>，<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenBy%2A>或<xref:System.Linq.Queryable.ThenByDescending%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29> is called and passed an expression tree that represents a sorting query, the resulting <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601> object must be of a type that implements <xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Linq.IQueryProvider.CreateQuery%60%601%28System.Linq.Expressions.Expression%29>调用该方法并传递一个表示排序的查询，所生成的表达式树<xref:System.Linq.IQueryable%601>对象的实现的类型必须为<xref:System.Linq.IOrderedQueryable%601>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建你自己 LINQ 提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ： 生成 IQueryable 提供程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370)MSDN 博客。
